name: Minun
description: The Cheering Pokémon. Minun is more concerned about cheering on its partners than its own safety. It shorts out the electricity in its body to create brilliant showers of sparks to cheer on its teammates.

abilities.name: Minus
abilities.description: This Pokémon boosts its attack and damage rolls by 2 if an ally also has a Plus or Minus ability

abilities.name: Volt Absorb
abilities.description: This Pokémon takes no damage from electricity or electric-type attacks. Instead, half of any electric damage done is absorbed, restoring the Pokémon's HP.
